title: Replace Hero background with uploaded image (keep site unchanged)

requirements.text: Update the homepage Hero background image to use the user-uploaded wheat-field image while keeping the rest of the website design, layout, copy, and behavior unchanged.

quotes: Placed the image in hero image. Make same website. All are perfect

acceptanceCriteria: The Hero section continues to reference the generated asset filename hero-wheat-field.dim_1920x1080.webp.
The Hero background visually matches the uploaded wheat-field image (same scene/composition) and renders correctly on the live site.
No other sections (Navbar, About, Benefits, Visual Trust, WhatsApp CTA, Support, Footer, Privacy/Terms) have any design/copy/behavior changes.

requirements.text: Place the processed Hero image asset in the static assets folder so it is served at /assets/generated/hero-wheat-field.dim_1920x1080.webp and loads via the existing ImageWithFallback path.

quotes: Placed the image in hero image. Make same website. All are perfect

acceptanceCriteria: A WebP file named hero-wheat-field.dim_1920x1080.webp exists under frontend/public/assets/generated/.
Loading the homepage successfully displays the Hero image (no fallback placeholder) in both local dev and production builds.
The image uses the correct dimensions (1920x1080) and is optimized as WebP.

constraints: Do not change any user-facing text; keep English copy exactly as currently implemented.
Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui or other immutablePaths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Keep existing filenames referenced in code (do not rename hero-wheat-field.dim_1920x1080.webp).
nonGoals: Redesigning the website theme, colors, typography, layout, or animations.
Changing WhatsApp rate limiting, Google Forms integration, or any backend logic.
Changing Visual Trust images or any other existing generated assets.

edits: Use the uploaded wheat-field image as the Hero background and export as WebP at 1920x1080 (IMG_20260214_021314.png > hero-wheat-field.dim_1920x1080.webp)
